claimantFirstName.description: String field designating the Claimant's first name.
claimantFirstName.title: Claimant First Name

claimantMiddleInitial.description: String field designating the Claimant's middle initial.
claimantMiddleInitial.title: Claimant Middle Initial

claimantLastName.description: String field designating the Claimant's last name.
claimantLastName.title: Claimant Last Name

claimantSsn.description: String field designating the Claimant's SSN. Only accepts exactly 9 characters.
claimantSsn.title: Claimant SSN

benefitTypeId.description: Number field designating the Benefit Type ID.
benefitTypeId.title: Benefit Type ID

documentTypeId.description: Number field correlating to a Claim Evidence document type ID. Document types primary use is loosely categorizing their contents.
documentTypeId.title: Document Type ID

dateVaReceivedDocument.description: Date field indicating the date the VA received the document. This can be any date in format of YYYY-MM-DD from 1900 until today
dateVaReceivedDocument.title: Date VA Received Document

subject.description: Free text describing the document. This is primarily notes used to assist claim developers.
subject.title: Subject

contentions.description: list of contentions by name associated to the document. This is only available for files where the documentType is 526 as evidenced by the is526 property on the /DocumentTypes endpoint response. If there are no contentions supplied, this key should not be on the request.
contentions.title: Contentions

alternativeDocumentTypeIds.description: list of associated document type Ids.
alternativeDocumentTypeIds.title: Alternative Document Type Ids

actionable.description: Boolean true/false for if the document is considered 'actionable' or whether claim action can be taken based on the content.
actionable.title: Actionable

manifestId.description: UUID that uniquely identifies the manifest
manifestId.title: Manifest Id

documentId.description: UUID that uniquely identifies the document
documentId.title: Document Id

notes.example: [This is a note for a document, These replace editing the document summary]
notes.title: Document Notes

payeeCode.description: String field designating the Payee Code. Only accepts 2 digits as a string with leading 0 if below 10.
payeeCode.title: Payee Code

endProductCode.description: Free text describing the document. This is primarily notes used to assist claim developers. This field must match a valid known end product code.
endProductCode.title: Subject

regionalProcessingOffice.description: String field designating the regional processing office.
regionalProcessingOffice.title: Regional Processing Office

facilityCode.description: String field designating the Facility Code.
facilityCode.title: Facility Code

claimantParticipantId.description: String field designating the claimant participant Id.
claimantParticipantId.title: Claimant Participant Id

sourceComment.description: String field containing any comments from the source of the document
sourceComment.title: Source comment

claimantDateOfBirth.description: Date field indicating the date the claimant was born. This can be any date in format of YYYY-MM-DD from 1900 until today
claimantDateOfBirth.title: Claimant Date of Birth

newMail.description: Boolean true/false for if the document is considered 'new mail'
newMail.title: New Mail
